item.description:
PICNIC! BRING ICY COLD THINGS OR SOMETHING TO GRILL!

Come on over july 4th for a pre-fireworks potluck/ BBQ and enjoy our summer garden.
2 pm onwards...

Think watermelon, (ok maybe spiked watermelon), greens from the garden, BBQ, corn, potato salad, salsa, chips, guac, cold soups, etc. mmmmmm!

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.c...
item.how_to_find_us: from Bridge st/ Rt 9 turn onto market st (rt if coming into town), before Joes Pizza take a right, go to end and last house on left/ 3rd floor and outside

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Fourth of July Geek BBQ
